This is a mailto link without showing the email address in the generated html source (with subject & body).

With text

Button

With no subject or body

test@example.com

With just subject

test@example.com

With just body

test@example.com

With multiple recipients (string)

test@example.com, test2@example.com

With multiple recipients (array)

test@example.com, test2@example.com

With CC & BCC

test@example.com

Don"t forget to set build.html.minify.decodeEntities = false
